review: Doctor not at all friendly ..proceeds for dental extraction without any discussion with parents ..will not recommend any parents to her..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Great doctor .Explained about the problem and how to prevent it. After surgery what to do and what not to do was explained in detailed manner . Called her many times to know change in medication and she was always available and responded well to all my queries.
Excellent doctor. She knows how to talk to children and encourage them for a procedure, without fear.

review: Dr. Punyatoya is nice and friendly. Listened to all our concerns patiently. I highly recommend this dentist. The office is very clean and high tech .
Visited the Doc for getting RCT done. She was friendly with my kid throughout the treatment duration.
reply_text: Thank you ma'am for your support.

review: I would like to thank Dr. Punya for explaining me the need for putting braces and importance of having good Dental hygiene. I was impressed. Overall my experience was good and the clinic is one of best in the area.
reply_text: Thanks alot sir,for your feedback. We always provided our best version

review: ****** * **** ******* I went for Teeth whitening and it took around 20 to 25 mins and i am happy with the result. Highly recommended.

I visited her for my daughter root canal treatment and cap installation, she will except 100 percent cooperation from 6 year old kid if not she will charge extra for that also by telling that my kid has broken something. and she installed cap twice then also it didn't stay. so I will not recommend her to anyone
reply_text:
Thanks for feedback,
I was expecting from you this . Sorry to tell  all my viewers that parents didn't respect doctor first and 2nd things because I'm lady doctor so they were taking advantage of it . They screamed at me. And most important part i had informed them that child have tongue thrusting habit( she is always putting tongue in that treated area and try to throw it out). She is uncooperative child. Parents doesn't know child favorite activities ( i mentioned because you should know parents behavior towards child care). If they are not taking care of their child ,how could they take care of doctor's words.

review: I was afraid before for the treatment. but now I would tell u all,that she is the best doctor.  Even the staff was polite and always take care of u.. when I came bck to home then also they care via call and messages ..I recommend this doctor..thanks!
